fields.description: "jake app:run" does a full rebuild of every test app when executed. It would be nice, now that Alloy supports "app:quickrun" builds with ios and fastdev with android, if we could also support quick builds with jake. For deep testing, it would be a good idea to do full rebuilds, but for quick testing, this will increase the speed of the development workflow.
fields.summary: Add "jake app:quickrun" to just copy app folder to harness for quick builds
